ca.ualberta.controllers
Class PasswordActivityController

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.controllers.SCController
      ca.ualberta.controllers.PasswordActivityController

public class PasswordActivityController
extends SCController

Acts as the controller for the PasswordActivityController. This controller has a reference to the PasswordStorage persistence object in order to manipulate the user's password. PasswordActivityController has the ability to verify and update/change a user's password.

Field Summary
static int UPDATE_PASSWORD
          Message code that tells controller to update the password in the password file.
static int UPDATED_RESULTS
          Message code that the controller sends to any listening views that an operation has been performed.
static int VERIFY_PASSWORD
          Message code that tells controller to verify the given password with the password in the password file.

handleMessage

public boolean handleMessage(int what,
                             java.lang.Object data)
Description copied from class: SCController
Allows a subclass of SCController to respond to messages that various entities will will send it.

Returns:
Whether or not the message was handled. A controller does not necessarily have to handle every message that is sent to it. It can ignore a message.

dispose

public void dispose()
Description copied from class: SCController
Method will be called when the controller is to be destroyed. Basically what will happen is here is disposing of any HandlerThread objects.
